question: Which country houses "Abijatta-Shalla National park"?
explanation: Abijatta-Shalla National Park is an IUCN Category IIÂ  National Park in the Ethiopian Highlands region of Ethiopia, established in 1974. This national park houses Mount Fike/O'a Caldera, a volcanic caldera located between two rift valley lakes such as Lake Abijatta and Lake Shalla.
